altTitles.ja: ちいかわ なんか小さくてかわいいやつ
なんか小さくてかわいいやつ

description.en: The sometimes happy, sometimes sad, and a tad stressful daily life of "some sort of small, cute creature" known as Chiikawa. Chiikawa enjoys delicious food with bees and rabbits, toils hard every day for the rewards of work, and still maintains a smile.
description.ja:
なんか小さくてかわいいやつ＝通称「ちいかわ」たちが繰り広げる、楽しくて、切なくて、ちょっとハードな日々の物語。

みんなに愛されて、優しくされて、こういう風になって暮らしたい…はずが、周囲には得体の知れない存在もたくさん!?
でも、大好きなハチワレやうさぎたちと、おいしいものを食べたり、労働の報酬でほしいものを手に入れようとしたり、毎日を一生懸命生きる「ちいかわ」の周りは、いつも笑顔で溢れています。

title.en: Yajin Tensei: Karate Survivor in Another World

altTitles.en: Reincarnated Savage: Karate Survivor in Another World

altTitles.ja: 野人転生
野人転生: KARATE SURVIVOR IN ANOTHER WORLD

description.en:
When 34-year-old Nozaki Hitoshi is hit by a truck, he is sent to a fantasy world by a dismissive god and dropped into a harsh wilderness without even the clothes on his back. His only salvation is a newly granted karate skill and his general survival instincts. Luckily, Hitoshi is up for the challenge–he’ll weave clothes out of tree bark, test fruit for poison, and crawl through the mud to test his kicks and punches against goblins and other creatures. No matter how much he levels up in this world, he still longs to find other humans to share his solitude. An engrossing fantasy that pits karate technique against swords and sorcery in another world!

(Source: Seven Seas Entertainment)
- [Web Novel Raw](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n5771ei/)  
- [Alternate Raw: NicoNico](http://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/41841)
description.ja: 姓名と風貌から、「野人」と呼ばれている野崎人志は、ひょんなことから異世界に転生させられる。
description.es-la: Nozaki Hitoshi, conocido como el "Hombre Salvaje" por su apellido y apariencia, se reencarna accidentalmente en otro mundo.

altTitles.ja: 恋々こい

description.en: This is a romantic comedy about Sakura, a girl who gives her all for love and Matsuyuki, a boy who absolutely hates romance.

title.en: Akuyaku Onzoushi no Kanchigai Seija Seikatsu - Nidome no Jinsei wa Yaritai Houdai Shitai Dake na no ni

altTitles.ja: 悪役御曹司の勘違い聖者生活～二度目の人生はやりたい放題したいだけなのに～

altTitles.ja-ro: Akuyaku Onzoushi no Kanchigai Seija Seikatsu

altTitles.ja: 悪役御曹司の勘違い聖者生活

altTitles.en: The Misunderstood Saintly Life of a Villainous Scion ~ I just want to do whatever I want in my second life~

description.en:
Ouga Vellet, the eldest son of the infamous corrupt lordly Vellet family, is a reincarnator. Having been taken advantage of due to his kindness in his past life, he now revels in the life of a mischievous villainous heir. From then on, Ouga spared no compromise, pushing the limits of "tyranny" to achieve his ambitions.

"Wow, Ouga-sama, you're amazing!"

...Just for "arrogant behavior," his reputation seems to soar without his control? The curtain rises on a life of misconceptions and misconceived saintliness!
description.ja:
悪徳領主として名高いヴェレット家の長男―オウガ・ヴェレットは転生者である。人の良さから前世で割を食ってばかりだった彼は、これを機にやりたい放題の悪役御曹司ライフを謳歌するため横暴の限りを尽くすはずが―


「さすがです！　オウガ様！」

……『傍若無人な振る舞い』をしてるだけなのに、なぜか周囲からの評価が瞬く間に上がっていき――⁉悪役御曹司の勘違いの勘違い聖者生活、開幕！

title.en: The Bugle Call: Song of War

altTitles.ja: 戦奏教室

description.en: The year is 1294, and war rages. Lucas, the bugler of a small mercenary band, is endlessly thrown into battle after battle, but longs for the day that he can fulfill his wish of becoming a real musician. One fateful day, however, Lucas's latent powers awaken and his life takes a drastic turn. Under the guidance of the Pope, Lucas is tasked to become a key player in the war and lead the fight against the Empire and its agent of destruction, the Garland. Burdened by this dangerous mission, Lucas still longs for the day that he may see his wish come true…

altTitles.ja: ふつうの軽音部

altTitles.fr: La fille qui découvre le rock !

description.en: With a passion for richly textured Japanese rock, first-year high school student Chihiro Hatono steps into the world of the light music club, new guitar in tow. But what awaits her behind those doors...? A drama of unfiltered youth and musical ambition takes the stage!
description.es-la: Chihiro Hatono, estudiante de primer año de preparatoria y apasionada por el rock japonés se adentra en el mundo del club de música ligera con una nueva guitarra a cuestas. Pero, ¿qué le espera tras esas puertas...? ¡Un drama sobre juventud sin filtros y ambición musical toma el escenario!
description.pt-br: Com uma paixão pelo rock japonês ricamente texturizado, a estudante do primeiro ano do ensino médio Chihiro Hatono entra no mundo do clube de música leve, com uma nova guitarra em mãos. Mas o que a espera atrás daquelas portas...? Um drama de juventude não filtrada e ambição musical sobe ao palco!

altTitles.ja: マッチ売り

description.en: University student Kiyotaka Hirose finds a love letter tucked into the pages of a borrowed book. The intended recipient is a mystery, but the writer’s identity is clear: a fellow student who’s suddenly leaving Tokyo and heading back to his hometown. Hirose is determined to return the letter, and as he tries to do so he runs into a black-market match seller, Seiji Hanashiro. Drawn to each other at first sight, tangled up in destiny and their own feelings, the men see their lives turned upside down by a single love letter. The first volume of Sakae Kusama’s standalone series, Lost Letters.

title.en: The 100 Girlfriends Who Really, Really, Really, Really, Really Love You

altTitles.ja: 君のことが大大大大大好きな100人の彼女

altTitles.es-la: Las 100 Novias Que Te Quieren Mucho Mucho Mucho Mucho Mucho

altTitles.ru: 100 девушек, которые очень-очень-очень-очень-очень сильно тебя любят

altTitles.zh-hk: 超超超超超喜歡你的100個女友

altTitles.pt-br: As 100 Namoradas que te Amam Muito, Muito, Muito, Muito, Muito, Mesmo.

altTitles.ja-ro: Kimi no koto ga daidaidaidaidai suki na 100-nin no Kanojo

altTitles.vi: 100 Cô Bạn Gái Này Rất, Rất, Rất, Rất, Rất Là Yêu Tôi Đó

altTitles.es-la: Mis 100 novias que me quieren mucho mucho

description.en:
Aijo Rentaro has asked a hundred girls out and struck out every time. 
In desperation, he prays for guidance, only to be told by a god that his rejections were due to a cosmic mishap! 
Now this god will set things right by making sure Aijo gets one hundred dates. 

Except, as things often go with gods, there’s a catch: each of his one hundred dates is Aijo’s destined soulmate! 
Worse, if he doesn’t return their feelings, they’ll all die in horrible - and hilarious - accidents!
description.ru: Что может быть хуже отказа на признание в любви? Сотня отказов на признание в любви! Айдзё Рэнтаро – безнадёжный романтик, признавшийся в любви уже сто раз, но по необъяснимым причинам каждый раз получавший отказ. В один прекрасный день перед ним предстаёт сам Бог Любви и говорит, что его ужасная удача в любви обернулась вспять! Теперь Айдзё предстоит встретить 100 девушек "Соулмейтов" – каждая из них предназначена ему самой судьбой и без памяти влюблена в него! Но вот беда: ни у одного человека не должно быть столько соулмейтов. Если он не ответит хоть одной из них взаимностью, девушку ждёт смерть от несчастного случая! Теперь это дело любви и смерти, а выбор за Айдзё.
description.pt-br: Aijou é um garoto que tem muito azar no amor e já foi rejeitado mais de 100 vezes. Desesperado ele vai num templo pedir ajuda aos deuses. E seu desejo foi atendido, para cada rejeição ele terá uma alma gêmea. Mas isso se tona uma maldição quando ele fica sabendo que se elas não forem felizes ao lado de sua alma gêmea, ele, elas vão morrer… Mas que merda, você ainda está lendo isso? Não escutou? São 100 garotas, 100! Não há tempo a perder!

altTitles.ja: 日々蝶々

altTitles.th: ปล่อยหัวใจโบยบินดั่งผีเสื้อ

description.de: Suiren lebt in ihrer eignen kleinen Welt und spricht kaum mit jemandem. Doch das hält die Jungs nicht davon ab, ihr scharenweise hinterherzurennen und um ihre Aufmerksamkeit zu buhlen. Nur einer scheint sie nie anzusehen: Kawasumi weiß nicht, wie er mit Mädchen reden soll und macht daher einen großen Bogen um sie. Doch genau diese abweisende Art fasziniert Suiren. Werden die beiden ihre Schüchternheit überwinden können?
description.en:
Shibazeki Suiren is a stunningly beautiful girl. Her classmates are astonished by her beauty, but after noticing her quiet manners and lack of contact except with her friends, she receives the nickname "Takane no Hana", a beautiful flower but impossible to reach. However, after a fellow freshman called Kawasumi Kouha saves her from a persistent suitor, she finds herself mesmerized by him… as he's the only boy who won't look at her no matter what.  
  
Chapter 75.4 is part of the Hibi Chouchou x Hirunaka no Ryuusei crossovers and is included in that entry.
description.es: Suiren, la chica más hermosa de todo el instituto, siente curiosidad por Kawasumi, un chico obsesionado con el karate. Esa curiosidad que siente es recíproca, pero a ambos se les da igual de mal hablar con personas del sexo opuesto. Este es el punto de partida de un amor del que ninguno es consciente aún. Así es como, poco a poco, da comienzo una historia de amor tan dulce como una nube de algodón de azúcar.
description.fr: La douce et réservée Suiren est sans aucun doute la plus jolie fille de son lycée. Sa beauté est remarquée de tous, sauf peut-être d’un membre du club de karaté, le timide Kawasumi. Cependant, tout peut arriver quand deux regards se croisent. Et c’est ainsi que débute une relation aussi discrète que maladroite…
description.id: Saat memasuki sekolah tinggi, Suiren sangat tenang tapi sangat lucu dan menjadi pusat perhatian anak laki-laki … Tapi seorang cowok tidak pernah memperhatikannya. Kisah seorang gadis pendiam dan anak yang pendiam. Sebuah cerita, cinta pendek menyegarkan.
description.it:
*Fiore inaccessibile.*

Così è soprannominata Suiren per la sua bellezza e per l'odio che nutre nei confronti dei maschi.

Ma quando incontra l'altrettanto taciturno Kawasumi qualcosa in lei comincia a cambiare...
description.ja: 学校一の美少女・すいれんが気になるのは硬派な空手男子・川澄。お互い気になるけどお互い異性が苦手な2人。純粋すぎて恋心にもまだ気づけない。ひらり、ふわりの恋物語がはじまります。
description.ko: 학교 최고의 미소녀 스이렌에게는 자꾸만 신경 쓰이는 사람이 있다. 그 사람은 바로 터프한 공수도 소년 카와스미. 서로가 신경 쓰이지만 피차 이성이 거북한 두 사람. 너무 순수해서 아직 연심을 눈치 채지 못한다. 보드라운 사랑 이야기가 시작된다.
description.ru:
Суирэн всегда была удивительно симпатичной, и в детстве часто её дразнили мальчишки, которым она нравилась. После этого она твёрдо решила поступать в среднюю школу для девочек. Однако в такой школе оказалось дела обстоят ещё хуже. Повзрослев, Суирэн в итоге понятия не имеет, как общаться с парнями, из-за чего сторонится их и кажется равнодушной.
В первый же день в старшей школе она мгновенно привлекает пристальное внимание противоположного пола. И лишь один Кавасуми совсем не обращает внимания на новый школьный феномен. Но, возможно, за небрежным безразличием скрывается что-то большее?
description.zh-hk:
希望能像隻蝴蝶，飛舞到你的身邊！
學校第一的美少女‧睡蓮所在意的男生是硬派的空手道男孩‧川澄。雖然彼此在意，卻對異性感到棘手的兩個人，太過單純還沒有察覺到戀慕心。輕輕柔柔的戀愛物語開始了。

altTitles.ja: ハーモニー

description.en: Published in the slow-release magazine Le Paradis, Harmony is a side story of 14-sai no Koi, following the age gap relationship between middle school student Nagai Tatsumi and his music teacher, Hinohara Yuka.

altTitles.en: Don't Mess with the Film Club!

altTitles.ja: 映像研には手を出すな！

altTitles.ja-ro: Eizouken ni wa Te o Dasu na!

description.en:
Asakusa Midori wants to create an anime, but she's too disheartened to make that first step by herself. But by pure chance, she meets Mizusaki Tsubame, an up-and-coming socialite secretly dreaming of becoming an animator. Together with Midori's money-loving best friend Kanamori Sayaka, the energetic trio slowly work towards making their "ultimate world" a reality!  
  


---

  
**Links:**  
- [![](https://i.imgur.com/dQCXZkU.png) Official Twitter](https://twitter.com/Eizouken_anime)  
- [![](https://i.imgur.com/dQCXZkU.png) Mangaka's Twitter](https://twitter.com/dennou319)  
- [Mangaka's YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCIhPflgXxYM9dsOzaI0sYgA)  
- [Official Anime (JP)](http://eizouken-anime.com/)  
- [Official Live-Action (JP)](https://eizouken-saikyo.com/)

altTitles.ja: 多重人格探偵サイコ

description.en: The main character is a detective, Kazuhiko Amamiya, suffering from Multiple Personality Disorder (a.k.a. Dissociative Identity Disorder). Starting out as a violent detective series with a twist (the twist being the variant personalities that take over Detective Amamiya at various intervals), the series evolves into an exceptionally complex and involved sci-fi conspiracy story.

altTitles.ja: 逃げ上手の若君

description.en: Yusei Matsui, creator of Assassination Classroom and Neuro: Supernatural Detective, is back! Set in feudal Japan in between the Kamakura and Muromachi periods, our hero Hojo Takatoki is a boy on the run that history all but forgot! When the Kamakura shogunate is overthrown by Ashikaga Takauji, Takatoki's family and standing are visciously taken away from him, and he must flee to the far reaches of the land to survive and seek out his revenge!
description.ru: Действие происходит в феодальной Японии между периодами Камакура и Муромати, наш герой Ходзе Такатоки - мальчик в бегах, о котором история почти забыла! Когда сегунат Камакура свергнут Асикагой Такаудзи, семья и положение Такатоки насильно отнимаются у него, и он должен бежать в дальние края страны, чтобы выжить и отомстить!

altTitles.ja: エルフェンリート

description.en:
Captured and isolated against their will, the Diclonius species are a threat waiting to break free. When a young Diclonius girl, Nyu, escapes from the research facility she was being held in, she manages to find solace in two allies until danger seeks her out, putting everyone at risk. However, her enemies soon realize they're in over their heads as an attempt to subdue Nyu results in unspeakable tragedy. [Dark Horse]

**Included one-shots:**
Volume 1: MOL
Volume 2: Digitopolis
Volume 3: Memoria
Volume 5: Elfen Lied (Pilot)
description.ru:
Диклониусы – это люди, которые мутировали по велению Господа. Кажется, что их главная миссия – уничтожать людей. Внешне они похожи на обычного человека, единственным отличием является пара рогов на голове. Кроме того, они обладают способностями телекинеза. За их спиной имеется бесчисленные пары рук, которые способны не только передвигать предметы, а и раскалывать вражеские черепа…
Из-за своих навыков диклониусов содержат в лабораториях под строгим надзором. Заключенные в цепях, пленники-мутанты подвергаются жестоким экспериментом со стороны правительства. Люси – одна из заключенных, которой удалось выбраться на свободу, жестоко уничтожив всех охранников, ставших на ее пути. В итоге ей стреляют в голову и она падает в океан. Волны прибивают прекрасную девушку к берегу, где ее находит Кота и Юка – подростки. Люси теряет все свои воспоминания и даже лишается способности нормально говорить. Единственное, что она произносит – лаконичное «ню». Собственно, так подростки и прозвали незнакомку. Ее приглашают в дом Коты, одевают и пытаются помочь девушке.
Однако… в ходе событий эпичной драмы, каждая страница которой омыта кровью и слезами, вы увидите, что эта манга вовсе не так проста, как кажется на первый взгляд. Боль, несправедливость, мучение, сумасшествие и месть… Попытки найти прибежище в этом жестоком мире. Вот, что такое «Эльфийская песнь».
description.uk: У підземних лабораторіях утримують диклоніїв — мутованих homo sapiens із двома ріжками на голові. Кажуть, вони — новий вид людства, обраний Богом. Диклонії вирізняються сильною тягою до жорстокости, тому їхнє існування ставить рід людський під загрозу вимирання...

title.en: Ano Toki Tasukete Itadaita Monster Musume desu.

altTitles.ja: あのとき助けていただいたモンスター娘です。
「あのとき助けていただいたモンスター娘です。」異世界おっさん教師 突然のモテ期に困惑する

altTitles.ja-ro: "Ano Toki Tasukete Itadaita Monster Musume desu.": Isekai Ossan Kyoushi Totsuzen no Moteki ni Konwaku suru

altTitles.zh: 那个时候被你拯救了的那个魔物娘是我的说。

altTitles.vi: Cô bé ấy là con quái vật mà tôi đã cứu lấy năm xưa

description.en: Some 20 years have passed since the protagonist was summoned to another world and retired from the army. He is still single in his 40s and lives as a low-ranking professor, until one day, an elite 'monster girl' transfers into his class.
description.ja: 異世界に召喚され、軍を退役してから約20年。主人公は未だ独身で、もう40代も半ば。Eランクの落ちこぼれ教師として生活するある日、彼の学園にエリートの「モンスター娘」が転校してくるのだった。。
description.vi: Câu chuyện về một ông giáo trung niên (trước đây là một anh hùng) ở dị giới tình cờ gặp lại cô học trò vốn dĩ là con bạch tuộc cute phô mai que mà anh từng cứu giúp và dạy dỗ trước đây.
description.pt-br: Cerca de 20 anos se passaram desde que o protagonista foi convocado para outro mundo e se aposentou do exército. Ele ainda está solteiro na casa dos 40 anos e vive como um professor de baixo escalão, até que um dia, uma 'garota monstro' de elite é transferida para sua classe.

altTitles.ja: ギャルせん

description.en: When Sora enters high school, his homeroom teacher is a sexy gal with huge breasts and she’s none other than the changed version of Suzune, the innocent girl next door who was his first love! As the teacher’s “educational guidance” escalates day by day, Sora is awakened to pleasures he’s never known before…!
description.ja:
ドSギャルの体育教師に、俺が開発されていく‥‥っ！

高校に入学した宙＜そら＞の担任は、爆乳で超セクシーな黒ギャル教師。それは、初恋の清楚な隣のお姉さん・すずねの変わり果てた姿だった！日々エスカレートする先生の「教育的指導」。宙は今まで知らなかった快感に目覚めてしまい‥‥！？

title.en: Senpai, Jitaku Keibiin no Koyou wa Ikaga desu ka?

altTitles.ja: センパイ、自宅警備員の雇用はいかがですか？

altTitles.ja-ro: Senpai, Jitaku Keibiin no Koyou wa Ikaga desu ka?

altTitles.en: Senpai, Will You Hire Me As a Housemaid?
Senpai, How About Hiring a Home Security Guard?

description.en: One day, Hajime Tamachi, an apathetic man, receives an unexpected message from Renafalt, a friend he met five years ago in an online game, whose face he has never seen: “Senpai, how about hiring a home security guard?”Convinced that Renafalt is 200% a man, Tama arrives at the meeting spot and sees someone with a red suitcase, just as they had arranged. However, that person turns out to be a beautiful girl with large breasts.«Ah… A-Are you… Senpai?»Thus begins the peculiar cohabitation of an apathetic man who only wants to live quietly in a corner of the world and a high school girl with social anxiety. The story of their strange life together has begun!

altTitles.ja: 獣王と薬草

description.en: Dungeons are the stuff of dreams—defeat the monsters, take their loot, and then venture into uncharted territory to discover hidden riches! Tina, an upstart adventurer with just such a dream, ends up mortally wounded while exploring a dungeon. Suddenly, the great demon known as the Beast King Garon, who was supposed to have been slain by a hero in the distant past, appears before her!  Dungeon fantasy meets medical drama!
description.ru:
Подземелья - это воплощение мечты…
Собирайте материалы с поверженных монстров,
добирайтесь до неисследованных мест и завладевайте сокровищами!
Тина, авантюристка, мечтает о таком успехе,
Исследуя подземелье, она получает тяжелое ранение.
Перед ней появляется сильнейший демон «Король зверей Гарон», когда-то в прошлом он должен был быть убит героем?..

Фэнтези и медицинская драма по мотивам подземелья от Konda Tatsukazu, автора оригинальной истории «Ginrou Bloodborne/Серебряный волк, рожденный в крови», начинается!

altTitles.ja: 魔力9999万 全属性使いの大賢者

altTitles.ja-ro: Maryoku 9999 man Zen Zokusei Tsukai no Dai Kenja

description.en:
Magic Level 99990000 All-Attribute Great Sage
All over the world, Monsters suddenly began appearing. The only person who could save humanity from “The Calamity” was “The Great Sage”, Ichikami Atsumu.
But, despite being satisfied in his death, he was reincarnated into the body of a boy who was bullied into killing himself, Kusanagi Minato.
Atsumu, waking up in a Japan fifty years into the future, is shocked to see a peaceful world, and where magic has become far weaker compared to when he was alive.
For now, Atsumu decides to go back to Kamui Magic Academy as Minato, but learns that mages are nothing more than a relic of the past, and in their place exist a class of privileged nobles
.After blowing off his bragging, low-levelled bullies, Atsumu gains the interest of a noble magician girl, Mizuha Yuika, as well as his schoolmates and teachers.
What’s more, Atsumu finds a sign that the Calamity, which was supposed to have been subdued, will return––
“It looks like my power is still needed”
Within the soul of student lies the Great Sage?!
The strongest Great Sage will change this world drunk on peace.
With his reincarnation in the future set, the curtain opens on a new Hero’s story!

title.en: Maigo no Onnanoko o Ie Made Todoketara, Genkan kara Detekita no wa Gakunen Ichi no Bishoujo deshita

altTitles.ja: 迷子の女の子を家まで届けたら、玄関から出て来たのは学年一の美少女でした

altTitles.ja-ro: Maigo no Onnanoko wo Ie Made Todoketara, Genkan kara Detekita no wa Gakunen Ichi no Bishoujo deshita

altTitles.en: When I Brought a Lost Girl Home, the Most Beautiful Girl in My Grade Came Out the Front Door
She Is the Beautiful Girl in the School Year

altTitles.vi: Đưa bé gái bị lạc trở về, người mở cửa là hoa khôi của khối

description.en:
One day, Kuroda Yusei, an introverted high school student with zero dating experience, returns a lost little girl to her house... when the most beautiful girl in his grade, Shirakawa Ayano, appears! 

"As thanks for saving my sister," she begins to approach him boldly for some reason, and every day is filled with mishaps!? On top of that, a busty otaku classmate and an attention-seeking junior girl also appear, and his daily life suddenly becomes more glamorous!? 

A school romance comedy where fate changes as you suddenly become close to "the girl of your dreams"!
description.ja:
恋愛経験ゼロの陰キャ高校生・黒田雄星がある日、迷子になっていた幼女を家まで届けると… 学年一の美少女・白河綾乃が出現!!

「妹を助けてくれたお礼に」と、なぜか彼女が大胆に迫ってくるようになり、毎日がハプニング状態!?
更に巨乳オタク同級生や、かまってちゃんな後輩女子も登場し、一気に華やかな日常に――!?

“憧れのあの子”と急接近して、運命が変わる学園ラブコメ！

description.en: 4-koma based on the mobile game Guns Girl Z (Houkai Gakuen / Houkai Gakuen 2).

altTitles.ja: よつばと！

description.en:
Yotsuba is a strange little girl with a big personality! Even in the most trivial, unremarkable encounters, Yotsuba's curiosity and enthusiasm quickly turns the everyday into the extraordinary!

---
- **Won the Excellence Award for Manga at the Japan Media Arts Festival in 2006**


---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media (2007)
description.ru:
Повседневная жизнь Ёцубы Койвай полна приключений. Она активная, любопытная и немного эксцентричная девочка. Настолько эксцентричная, что её отец прозвал её странной и несведущей в вещах, которые должны знать даже пятилетки. Из-за этого самое простое событие для неё становится настоящим приключением. Проходят дни, Ёцуба заводит новых друзей и показывает всем на личном примере, что каждый день может быть в радость.

---

(Source: [shikimori](https://shikimori.one/mangas/104-yotsuba-to))

description.en: Yoon Seol-young faces a harsh reality: a cheating boyfriend of three years, a forced blind date with a divorced man ten years her senior, and the burden of financially supporting her suffocating family. Just when she wishes to escape her stifling life, Ki Tae-hwan, the executive director of Shinhwa Group, rumored to be gay due to his excessively clean private life, approaches her with a proposal: "Let's get married. I'll take you to a higher place." Overnight, Seol-young goes from being the secretary in the executive director's office to becoming his daughter-in-law. But what is the true purpose behind Tae-hwan's marriage proposal?

"I didn't even know what had hurt me." Min Jiho, a former second-tier idol, ended his idol career, leaving only confusion in his heart. Planning to leave the entertainment industry entirely, Jiho unexpectedly encounters his idolized top actor, Kang Taeyeon, during a variety show as a substitute. This leads him to become embroiled in a light scandal...

title.en: Josou Danshi wa Skirt wo Nugitai!

altTitles.ja: 女装男子はスカートを脱ぎたい！

altTitles.en: The Crossdressing Boy Wants to Take Off His Skirt

description.en: Uichiro, a junior high school boy, harbors a secret he cannot share with his childhood friend, Tama-chan. He has been cross-dressing for her because she has a phobia of men. This is a thrilling yet agonizing comedy about a boy who cross-dresses for the girl he loves!
description.ja:
男子中学生の宇一郎には、幼馴染のたまちゃんに言えないある秘密があった。
それは男性恐怖症である彼女のために「女の子を演じている」ということ。
想いを寄せる少女のために女装を続ける年頃男子のドキドキ悶絶コメディ！！

altTitles.ja: Kiss×Sis
キスシス

description.en: Keita has two step-sisters (without blood-relation) who love him in a lustful way and have no problems expressing it, they even like to compete over it; much to the laughs of his friends (which he usually endures without problems). One day they come to his school to give him his lunch, he gets annoyed due to the atmosphere and explodes on them, to counter attack his anger they confess their tender feelings for him in front of everyone and leave. Feeling sorry he chases after them and says that he'll study hard in order to get in the same highschool as them.
description.it: La storia di Kissxsis inizia con lo studente Keita Suminoe alle prese con gli esami di ingresso per le scuole superiori. Ad aiutarlo ci sono le sue sorelle gemelle più grandi di lui. Le ragazze, Ako e Riko, non hanno alcun legame di sangue con Keita, non fanno nulla per nascondere i propri sentimenti amorosi nei confronti del ragazzo, e si lasciano andare a effusioni ed avances anche in pubblico. I genitori dei tre ragazzi incoraggiano Keita ad accettare le attenzioni di una delle due sorelle, e Keita nonostante l'imbarazzo non disdegna l'interesse delle due ragazze nei suoi confronti. Ako e Riko, nonostante siano tecnicamente rivali fra loro, sono spesso unite e complici nell'escogitare piani per allontanare Keita da qualunque altra ragazza possa girare intorno a lui…
description.pt: Kiss x Sis conta a história de Keita Suminoe, um jovem estudante do ensino fundamental. Ele está vivendo em uma casa com seus pais e suas meio-irmãs gêmeas, Ako e Riko, que o beijam e o assediam sempre competindo para ver quem mostra mais amor por ele. Embora se considerem irmãos eles não compartilham relação sanguínea; seus pais se casaram enquanto eles estavam na infância. Ainda assim, a relação incomoda Keita profundamente, já que seus pais permitem essa relação, e visto que foram criados juntos, e escandaliza à grande parte dos que vêm a saber desta. As gêmeas, contudo, são insistentes, e fazem o possível e o impossível para ficar com ele. Nessa conjuntura, entram outros personagens que possuem esse mesmo interesse, e a trama se desenrola em cima da disputa por Keita.
description.pt-br: Keita tem duas meias-irmãs (sem parentesco) que o amam de uma forma lasciva e não têm problemas em expressar isso, elas até gostam de competir por isso; para as risadas de seus amigos (o que ele geralmente suporta sem problemas). Um dia, elas vêm à escola dele para lhe dar seu almoço, ele fica irritado devido à atmosfera e explode com elas, para contra-atacar sua raiva, elas confessam seus sentimentos ternos por ele na frente de todos e vão embora. Sentindo pena, ele corre atrás delas e diz que vai estudar muito para entrar na mesma escola que elas.

description.en:
One is a dazzling star who dreams of shining in the world of showbiz. Another is a new designer who has the reputation of being “delicate as a flower” due to her simple beauty.

She sees your thirst for success and yearning for authenticity behind your angelic facade. She approaches, like a gale that kisses a rose, and moves away, like a moonbeam. They get involved, they let go, they take the seduction game to the limit. She becomes the rose that blooms in her blood, and reaches the height of glory with her.

Tang Wanting: “I will pluck the moon for you with my hands.”
Shang Yi: “You are my moon.”

title.en: I Became the Only Healer in This World

altTitles.ru: Я стала единственным хилером в этом мире

altTitles.ja: この世界で唯一のヒーラーになりました

description.en:
Healer who is addicted to gambling has been on a single path for years. Somehow, the world changed and I became the world's only healer. [There is a place that needs you, a unique healer.] [Will you respond to the summons?] ‘What? 'You have a tank dealer but no healer?' No, what. Is there any balance for X network with tank damage but no healer? [The constellations watching you complain that this is not a game, but reality!] *** It has been several decades since the Gate appeared. I heard that a lot of strategies and data have been accumulated over the years. ‘Why is everyone proceeding so inefficiently? 'Frustrating?' I was serious about my strategy, so I just tried my best to close the gate. “It was you who saved me. “I made it so that only you can see it.” 1st place in the former rankings who were said to have been betrayed and went into hiding. “I need you. my savior “My life.” Head of the world's top 10 guild unions. “Don’t abandon me. Because I can’t breathe without you.” Up to 1st place in the current ranking. I was too busy clearing the gate, but strange guys started to come by. 

[Plate/Constellation/Hunter/Himsumjin/Munchkin/Yeojuwon Tower/Salvation]
description.ru:
Девушка, играющая за хилера на протяжении многих лет, так и не смогла ничего достичь. Однажды, невероятным образом она переместилась в другой мир, в котором не оказалось ни одного хилера.  
— Есть пати, которое хочет пригласить вас, невероятного и неповторимого хилера. Вы ответите на призыв?  
"А? У них есть танки и ДД, но ни одного хилера? У них тут вообще хоть что-то сбалансированно?"  — 
Это не игра, а реальность. И созвездия, защищающие тебя, будут жаловаться тебе на жизнь!    

***  
Врата появились несколько десятилетий назад. За это время накопилось множество тактик и сведений, но...  
— Что за унылые атаки в лоб? Ещё не надоело?  
Из-за очень наивной тактики врата брали напролом.  
— Это вы ведь меня спасли? Лишь благодаря вашим способностями.  
Преданный, скрывающийся бывший первый ранг...  
— О, моя спасительница, не покидай меня.  
...директор ассоциации 10 гильдий...  
— Прошу, не бросай меня. Я не смогу жить без тебя.  
...и даже нынешний первый ранг — каждый был восхищен ею.  
Когда она была занята тактикой прохождения врат, начали появляться странные дети, что совершенно не входило в её планы.

title.en: My Harem Consists Entirely of Female Demon Villains

altTitles.zh: 我的后宫全是反派魔女

altTitles.zh-ro: Wo De Hougong Quan Shi Fanpai Monü

description.en: I, the earthling "hero" of this story, crossed over into another world based on a video game and suddenly appeared in a villainous female demon's bed when I arrived. If not for the fact that I had married all the villains in the game before crossing over, I'd have been killed pretty quickly. Now, the villains keep pestering me, asking me to help them rule the world, and vying for my hand in marriage. What am I supposed to do? I'll await your answers online! It's urgent!

altTitles.ja: ローゼンガーテン・サーガ

description.en:
Lynn's village getting attacked by bandits doesn't keep her down in the dumps for long! Picking up a sword housing an extraordinary pervert… I mean hero, Siegfried, she sets off on a journey of many bouts with various degenerat… ahem, heroes!

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [Comikey](https://comikey.com/comics/rosen-garten-saga-manga/525/), [MangaPlaza](https://mangaplaza.com/title/0303005019/)
description.ja: 野盗に村を襲われたリンは、窮地の中、１本の剣を手にする。その剣は英雄・ジークフリートの魂が宿った魔剣で、リンは圧倒的な力で野盗たちを制圧する。だが、リンの股間にはもう１本の凶悪な“剣”がそそり立っていて…!?
description.pt-br: Depois que sua vila foi atacada por um bando de ladrões, Lynn se levantou para proteger seus amigos e o mundo com a ajuda de uma Espada Mágica, que contém a alma de um herói...? Uma história de fantasia/ação com uma heroína sem precedentes(?)

title.en: I Took Over The System Players

description.en: College student, Xing Ye gained the ability to take over another person’s body with a success rate of 100%, but by chance took over the body of a necromancer. This necromancer turns out to be the owner of the system, and it’s all because of this system that he’s a corpse after dying. This system gives suicide missions with no regards of the host’s abilities, but Xing Ye finds this suicide system quite compatible with him now that he’s a corpse? “Hahaha, I’m already dead, what do I have to fear?”
description.zh: 大学生星夜死后获得百分百夺舍能力，却意外夺舍炼尸，而这炼尸生前竟然是系统持有者，之所以死亡变成炼尸都是被他的系统害得，这系统会不顾宿主等级的派发作死任务，但星夜发现身为炼尸的自己和这作死系统竟意外的有配合？哈哈哈，老子已经死了还怕什么作死

title.en: The Villainess' Blind Date Is Too Perfect

altTitles.en: The Villainess' Boyfriend Is So Perfect
The Villain's Match Is Too Perfect
The Devil's Match Is Too Perfect

altTitles.zh: 恶女的相亲对象太完美了

altTitles.en: The Villainess' Match Is Too Perfect

description.en:
Possessed by the rumored evil woman ‘Yvonne Argenthoz’! In her original work, she was a villain who met a tragic end because she was jealous of the female lead with her male lead, but after being possessed by her, Yvonne resolves to enjoy the life of a diamond spoon in peace.

But the novel and development are different?!

“If it’s Yvonne's… fishery, I think it’ll be fine.”

From the perfect match going straight to Yvonne out of the blue, and the unexpected dark side of the story. Will Yvonne be able to live a peaceful diamond spoon life as planned?

title.en: Shitsurengo, Kenaku datta Osananajimi Ga sato Kashi Mitai ni Amai - Sugar After Bitter

altTitles.en: After a Broken Heart, a Childhood Friend Is Sweet as Sugar Candy

altTitles.zh: 失恋后，我和原本态度恶劣的青梅竹马的关系变得甜蜜了起来

altTitles.ja: 失恋後、険悪だった幼なじみが砂糖菓子みたいに甘い ビターのちシュガー

altTitles.en: After a Heartbreak, My Bitter Childhood Friend Is Now Sweet Like Sugar

altTitles.vi: Thất Tình, Bạn Thuở Nhỏ Của Tôi Trở Nên Ngọt Ngào Như Kẹo Đường

description.en: Yuu Sawatari, a high school boy, is sick after suffering a painful heartbreak. His nextdoor childhood friend, Cocoa Shirayuki, shows up to take care of him. From that day on, the distance between them grows closer... This is a tense, sweet, and slightly heartrending love story of a boy who has lost his love and his childhood friend whose love has long been unrequited.
description.ja:
つらい失恋により体調を崩してしまった男子高生、沢渡悠。
そんな彼のもとに、理由も分からないまま険悪になっていた、隣の部屋の幼なじみ、白雪心愛が現れ、看病してくれることに。
「どうして急に俺の看病なんて――」
「迷惑でしたら帰りますが?」
その日以降、遠ざかっていた二人の距離は近付いていく…。
彼女との触れ合いの中で、傷付いた心を癒やされていく悠。
やがて心愛に心を惹かれるようになって――。
これは、恋を失ってしまった男の子と、ずっと片思いを続けていた幼なじみの、じれったくて甘くてちょっと切ない、そんな恋物語。

Tsurai shitsuren ni yori taichō o kuzushite shimatta danshikōsei, Sawatari Yū. Son'na kare no moto ni, riyū mo wakaranai mama ken'aku ni natte ita, tonari no heya no osananajimi, shirayuki kokoroai ga araware, kanbyō shite kureru koto ni. "Dōshite kyū ni ore no kanbyō nante ――" "meiwakudeshitara kaerimasu ga?" Sonohi ikō, tōzakatte ita futarinokyori wa chikadzuite iku…. Kanojo to no fureai no naka de, kizu tsuita kokoro o iyasa rete iku Yū. Yagate kokoroai ni kokoro o hika reru yō ni natte ――. Koreha, koi o ushinatte shimatta otokonoko to, zutto kataomoi o tsudzukete ita osananajimi no, jirettakute amakute chotto setsunai, son'na koi monogatari.

title.en: Yopparai Touzoku, Dorei no Shoujo wo Kau

altTitles.ja: 酔っぱらい盗賊、奴隷の少女を買う

altTitles.en: A Drunk Thief Bought a Slave Girl

altTitles.id: Thief Pemabuk yang Membeli Budak Gadis

altTitles.es-la: Un Ladrón Borracho que Compró una Esclava

description.en:
A hangover leads to a shared life between a thief and a slave girl.
 
Harris is an adventurer who works as a thief and scout, a job that is often shunned due to poor reputation.
 
One day he gets drunk and buys a slave girl, Tiana. Tiana, who had been treated badly and not given enough food until then, comes to adore Harris, who treats her kindly, as her master. Harris, who had been hoping that Tiana would grow up to be a beautiful woman, is gradually drawn to her because of her innocence.
 
Harris' life changes drastically when he begins living with Tiana: warm meals, freshly washed clothes, and interaction with the townspeople who had never come close to him before. On the other hand, he finds himself in more and more troublesome situations, will he manages to escape from them with his skill and tact...?
 
This is the story of the "rebirth" of a shabby thief, which begins with an encounter with a slave girl.

altTitles.ja: 宇崎ちゃんは遊びたい!

description.en: Annoying! Cute! But Annoying!  Shinichi Sakurai is a grumpy-faced, athletic and quiet college student who just wants to be left alone,  but he is frequently teased by his cute, stacked underclassman Hana Uzaki, whom he has known since high school.     Sugoi Dekai means something along the lines of "impressively huge."
description.pt:
A vida diária de um quieto universitário que só quer ficar sozinho, que começou a ser zombado pela sua Kouhai "Fofa! Mas irritante!".  


---

**Links:**  
- [Author's Twitter](https://twitter.com/syokumutaiman)
description.pt-br:
A vida diária de um quieto universitário que só quer ficar sozinho, que começou a ser zombado pela sua Kouhai "Fofa! Mas irritante!".

[ 1° TEMP. DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 4, Cap 35. ]

altTitles.ja: 大室家

description.en:
*A spin-off of the YuruYuri series featuring the Oomuro family of sisters!*

From oldest to youngest, there's **Nadeshiko**, the cool and serious high schooler; **Sakurako**, the silly, lazy, and (slightly) dimwitted middle schooler; and **Hanako**, the intelligent and mature elementary schooler! 

This story focuses on these three sisters, their friends. and the many fun and wild adventures they have together!
description.ja: 優秀な長女・撫子、残念な次女・櫻子、優秀な三女・花子からなる大室家３姉妹。自由奔放な櫻子を中心に今日も大室さん家は賑やかです♪

title.en: Endo and Kobayashi's Live Commentary on the Villainess

altTitles.ja: ツンデレ悪役令嬢リーゼロッテと実況の遠藤くんと解説の小林さん

altTitles.ja-ro: Tsundere Akuyaku Reijou Liselotte to Jikkyou no Endo-kun to Kaisetsu no Kobayashi-san

altTitles.en: The Play-by-Play Commentator Endo-kun and Colour Commentator Kobayashi-san's Live Commentary on the Tsundere Villainess Liselotte
Endo and Kobayashi Live! The Latest on Tsundere Villainess Lieselotte

altTitles.ru: Эндо и Кобаяши в прямом эфире комментируют злодейку

altTitles.th: นางร้ายสุดซึน ลีเซล็อตเต กับขบวนการพลิกลิขิตสู่ชีวิตแฮปปี้เอนด์

altTitles.ko: 츤데레 악역영애 리제롯테와 실황의 엔도 군과 해설의 코바야시 양~

altTitles.zh: 傲娇恶役大小姐莉泽洛特与实况转播远藤君和解说员小林

altTitles.vi: Bình luận của Endo và Kobayashi về nhân vật phản diện

description.en:
On the outside, otome villainess Liselotte seems foul in every way, a purely evil character. However, as revealed in her diary, she was always hiding both her pain and her true feelings for Prince Siegward. While she keeps this locked away, an evil witch ultimately possesses her, leading to her demise—a tragic end for the tsundere villainess. This is how the story always goes, an end coded into the game MagiKoi.

Broadcasting club members Aoto Endo and Shihono Kobayashi decide to play this game. In another universe, Prince Siegward hears their voices, believing it to be a divine revelation from a god and goddess. These voices clue him into something he never noticed before: Liselotte is actually overwhelmingly adorable!

There are no resets in this game, and just one chance to change the future for the ill-fated villainess. In years to come, these two entities, who would guide the country to prosperity and greatness, would be known as play-by-play Endou and color commentator Kobayashi!
description.ru:
«Она всегда делает такое унылое лицо, даже если она не расстроена! Ох, ну почему она не может быть честна сама с собой?»  
  
«В конце концов, она цундэрэ! Когда уровень её смущения превышает определенный порог, она не может сдержать себя. В любом случае она пытается сказать, что она не против прикосновений, если это не у всех на виду.»  
  
Пока Эндо-кун пытается самостоятельно пройти игру, Кобаяши-сан упорно стремится пробиться через цундере-защиту своей любимой героини — леди Лизелотт, «главной злодейки» отомэ-игры «Магикой».  
  
Но неожиданно появился тот, кто может слышать их голоса — наследный принц Сигурд, жених Лизелотт. Именно здесь и начинается история.
description.vi:
『Cô ấy luôn mang bộ mặt gắt gỏng như thế mặc dù chẳng buồn bã gì! Ôi, sao cô ấy không chịu thành thật với chính mình chứ!?』
『Cô ấy tsundere mà. Khi cô ấy quá bối rối rồi vượt quá một giới hạn nhất định thì cảm xúc của cô ấy sẽ bùng nổ ra. Điểm thú vị nhất là cô ấy vẫn thể hiện một chút sự thành thật ở những nơi ít người.』
Trong khi Endo-kun đang nhiệt tình phản ứng lại với những biểu cảm khôi hài của Lady Liselotte - nhân vật phản diện trong một trò chơi otome game, thì Kobayashi-san lại nói về cách phá vỡ lớp tsundere đó của cô nàng.
Đột nhiên, một nhân vật trong game có thể nghe được giọng nói của họ; Vị hôn phu của Liselotte, Hoàng tử Siegward.
Đó là nơi mà câu chuyện này bắt đầu.

altTitles.en: The Maid Who Can't Hide Her Feelings (Serialization)

altTitles.ja: メイカさんは押しころせない

altTitles.pt-br: A Empregada Que Não Consegue Esconder Seus Sentimentos (Serialização)

altTitles.vi: Meika-san Không Thể Thổ Lộ Tình Cảm Của Cô Ấy

description.en: A serialization of the webcomic about a maid, Meika, who can't completely suppress her feelings for her master, Kouta.
description.vi: Một câu chuyện kể về một cô hầu gái, Meika, người không thể kìm nén hoàn toàn tình cảm của mình dành cho chủ nhân của cô ấy, Kouta.
description.es-la: Una serialización del webcomic sobre una maid, Meika, quien no puede reprimir por completo sus sentimientos por su amo, Kouta.
description.pt-br: A serialização da webcomic sobre uma empregada, Meika, que não consegue ocultar completamente seus sentimentos pelo seu mestre, Kouta.

altTitles.ja: 少女70M

description.en:
Just a normal story about 70-Meter-tall High School Girl fighting Kaijus and protecting Japan
The "giant monster" that suddenly appeared has caused serious damage to Japan. . .
description.ja: 突然現れた『巨大怪獣』は日本に深刻な被害を与えていた。。。

altTitles.en: You are a Four Leaf Clover

altTitles.ja: きみは四葉のクローバー

description.en: Uichi was once popular, but now he is being bullied excessively. Then suddenly, his first love, Yotsuha, appears in front of him. What is this cute and brave girl's purpose...?
description.ja: かつての人気者で、今は過激ないじめを受ける宇一。そんな彼の前に突然現れた初恋の相手・よつは。可愛く健気な彼女の目的とは一体…!?
description.vi: Câu chuyện romcom nhẹ nhàng về hành trình chữa lành trái tim đã tan vỡ của main
description.zh: 某天，曾很有人气的宇一的生活陡然一变。 以往光芒四射的日子被用抹布也无法擦去的黑暗所笼罩。 这时，熟悉宇一过去的初恋—— 四叶突然出现在了他的面前。 她的目的究竟是…！？

altTitles.ja: 妻、小学生になる。
If my wife become an elementary school student.

altTitles.en: If My Wife Became an Elementary School Student.
My Wife Became An Elementary School Student.

altTitles.es: Mi esposa volvió a la escuela primaria

altTitles.es-la: Si mi esposa renaciera como una estudiante de primaria

altTitles.fr: Ma femme s'est réincarnée en écolière

altTitles.ja: 妻小

altTitles.vi: Vợ tôi là Học sinh Tiểu Học

description.en: The trials and tribulations of a single father, who one day meets the reincarnation of his deceased wife, who perished a decade before.
description.es:
Las pruebas y adversidades de un padre soltero, que un día se encuentra con la reencarnación de su difunta esposa, que murió una década antes.  
  


---

Links  
- [Author's Twitter](https://twitter.com/yayu_murata)
description.es-la: Nijima Keisuke es un hombre asalariado, vivía felizmente junto a su esposa y a su hija, hasta que un día su esposa fallece y él se derrumba. Siendo ahora un padre soltero, tuvo que esforzarse más por su hija pero perdía el camino y su estilo de vida se volvió muy deplorable, hasta que un día aparece una niña diciendo ser la reencarnación de su esposa y se propone ayudarlo para cambiar y corregir su lamentable situación actual.
description.pt-br: As provações e tribulações de um pai solteiro, que um dia encontra a reencarnação de sua falecida esposa.

title.en: Watashi o Aisuru Sannin no Danna-sama

altTitles.ja: 私を愛する3人の旦那さま

altTitles.en: My Three Husbands Who Love Me

description.en: Rio Yamabuki died saving a cat. When she wakes up, she finds herself 15 years in the past, on the day her husband proposed to her. She believed that marrying him would bring her happiness. However, the reality was a disastrous marriage filled with her husband's abuse, caring for his parents, and ultimately being killed by her husband and his lover for insurance money. A grim reaper appears and tells her, "Redo your marriage as you wish." If she can redo her life from rock bottom, this time she will live for herself and seize happiness!! Just when she thought that, three high-spec men claiming to be her husband appear...!?
description.ja:
猫を助けて死んでしまった山吹理央（やまぶきりお）。

目を覚ますと、そこは15年前に、旦那からプロポーズをされる日だった。

この人と結婚すれば幸せになれると信じていた。
しかし現実は、旦那のモラハラ、義家族の介護、仕舞いには保険金目当てに
旦那と不倫相手の親友に殺された散々な結婚。

そこへ死神が現れ、猫を助けた代わりに、「お前の望む結婚をやり直せ」と言う。

どん底人生をやり直せるなら、今度こそ自分のために生きて幸せをつかみ取る！！
・・・と思った矢先、理央の旦那だと名乗るハイスぺ男が「３人」も現れて・・・！？

title.en: Hazure Hantei kara Hajimatta Cheat Majutsushi Seikatsu

altTitles.ja: ハズレ判定から始まったチート魔術士生活

altTitles.zh: 从废柴判定开始的魔术士人生

altTitles.en: Life as a Cheat Magician that began with a False Judgment

description.en:
One day, all the eighth grade students were transferred to another world.

The princess of the other world summoned them to make up for their lack of strength. The students are threatened and decide to follow the princess, and they are made to take a magical power test to determine their abilities. While everyone is sorted according to their results, Kokubun Kento's result is a flop.

Judged as useless, he is expelled. However, there is actually a tremendous ability lurking within Kento... 

The life-size eighth grader Kento, together with his fellow skeletons, aims to rescue his classmates!

---

[web novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n5782dy/) (jp)
description.ja:
ある日、中学２年生の生徒全員が異世界に転移させられた。

異世界の王女が、戦力不足を補うために彼らを召喚したのだ。脅されて王女に従うことにした生徒たちは、能力を調べる魔力判定を受けさせられる。みんなが結果に応じて振り分けられていくなか、国分健人の判定結果はハズレ。

使い物にならないと判断されて、追放されてしまった。だが、健人の内には実は物凄い能力が潜んでいて… 

等身大の中学２年生の健人が、仲間になったスケルトンとともに同級生たちの救出を目指す！

altTitles.ja: ギャル嫁の秘密

description.en: Fuyuki is a beautiful and cool gal! But there's a secret side of her that she only shows in front of her husband...? A cute love comedy with a gal wife!
description.ja:
冬雪（ふゆき）は美人でクールなギャル！でも「旦那」の前だけ見せる秘密の姿があって……？SNS累計37万いいね！の可愛い「ギャル嫁」とのラブコメディ！
 
--- 
 
Fuyuyuki (Fuyuki) wa bijin de kūruna gyaru! Demo "dan'na" no mae dake miseru himitsu no sugata ga atte...? SNS ruikei 37 man ī ne! No kawaii "gyaru yome" to no rabukomedi!
description.es-la: ¡Fuyuki es una hermosa y atractiva gal! ¿Pero hay una parte de ella que solo le muestra a su esposo y mantiene en secreto del resto? Una linda comedia romántica con una esposa que es una gal.
description.pt-br: Fuyuki é uma linda gyaru! Mas tem um lado secreto que ela só mostra para o seu marido? Uma comédia romântica fofa com uma esposa gyaru!

altTitles.ja: カラダ探し

description.en: Look forwards to the ghost story of the red person. "Hey, Asuka… search for my body". At school in the middle of the night, Asuka and her friends search for the scattered body-parts. If they don't find the entire body, the 9th November is repeated and the red person will continue to kill them. Who is the red person? Why is Haruka asking them to search for the body-parts?

altTitles.ja: 夢と恋ではつり合わない

altTitles.id: Cinta dan Impian Itu Tidak Bisa Digabung

description.en: Kurata Hikaru has fallen in love with her classmate Kira Kairi at first sight. Now, she's too lovestruck to concentrate on her studies. Her plan? Get Kairi to reject her so she can focus again.
description.id: Kurata Hikaru jatuh cinta pada pandangan pertama dengan teman sekelasnya Kira Kairi. Sekarang, dia jadi terlalu gila cinta dan tidak bisa konsentrasi dengan pelajaran. Jadi, dia berencana meminta Kairi untuk menolak cintanya agar dia bisa kembali fokus belajar lagi.

altTitles.ja: 美味しんぼ

description.en:
Around the offices of Tozai News, Shiro Yamaoka has a reputation for being over-blunt, under-ambitious, and generally an all-around slacker. So why has he been given the important job of coming up with the "Ultimate Menu" to celebrate the newspaper's 100th anniversary? Because he possesses qualities his other colleagues don't: an exquisitely discerning palate, an encyclopedic knowledge of food and drink, and a masterful touch in the kitchen.

---
- **Won the Shogakukan Manga Award for Seinen/General in 1987**

title.en: Danjo no Yujou wa Seiritsu suru? (Iya, Shinai!!)

altTitles.ja: 男女の友情は成立する？（いや、しないっ！！）

altTitles.en: Can a Boy and Girl Friendship Hold Up? (No It Can't)

altTitles.zh: 男女之间真的存在友情吗

description.en:
At a rural junior high school, a man and a woman vowed an eternal friendship. The relationship between the two who became a fateful community toward one dream-two years have passed without any particular progress ...!

　Yuu Natsume, a flower-loving plant boy, and Inuzuka Himari, a girl who hasn't been in love for the first time yet, have been peacefully close friends in the gardening club with only two of them.

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Niconico](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/54842)
description.ja: 未だに初恋がこない陽キャ女子・犬塚日葵と、花を愛する植物系男子・夏目悠宇はふとしたきっかけで友情に落ちた。 それから２年――相変わらず『親友』をやっているふたりだったが、悠宇がかつての初恋相手と再会したことで日葵と悠宇の関係も変わり出し……？

title.en: Ryoushin no Shakkin wo Katagawari shite morau Jouken wa Nihon Ichi Kawaii Joshikousei to Issho ni Kurasu koto deshita.

altTitles.ja: 両親の借金を肩代わりしてもらう条件は日本一可愛い女子高生と一緒に暮らすことでした。

altTitles.en: I'm Gonna Live with You Not Because My Parents Left Me Their Debt But Because I Like You

altTitles.zh: 替我父母偿还债务的条件是与日本最可爱的女高中生同居。

altTitles.zh-ro: Tì wǒ fùmǔ chánghuán zhàiwù de tiáojiàn shì yǔ rìběn zuì kě'ài de nǚ gāozhōng shēng tóngjū.

description.en:
The main character, Yoshizumi Yuya, was being pressured into paying off the debt left by his parents who had fled abroad. It was his classmate, Hitotsuba Kaede, chosen as the cutest schoolgirl in Japan, who saved him from this crisis of life and death. However, there was a catch. The condition required to fulfill in return for taking over his debt was — "In return for the loan, you have – to live with me."
“Why did that happen?!”

Yuya's daily life collapsed on this day.

"Yuya-kun. Let’s take a bath together."
"Yuya-kun, please be my hug pillow."
"That’s enough, Hitotsuba-san!"
description.id: Tokoh utama, Yoshizumi Yuya, dipaksa untuk melunasi hutang yang ditinggalkan oleh orang tuanya yang melarikan diri ke luar negeri. Itu adalah teman sekelasnya, Hitotsuba Kaede, terpilih sebagai siswi terimut di Jepang, yang menyelamatkannya dari krisis hidup dan mati ini. Namun, ada motif tersembunyi di balik itu. Syarat yang harus dipenuhi sebagai imbalan untuk melunasi utangnya adalah — “Sebagai imbalan atas pinjaman itu, kau harus tinggal bersamaku.” “Kenapa jadi begitu?!” Kehidupan sehari-hari Yuya runtuh pada hari ini. “Yuya-kun. Ayo mandi bersama.” “Yuya-kun, jadilah bantal pelukku.” “Cukup, Hitotsuba-san!” Kisah cinta komedi romantis yang menggugah antara Hitotsuba Kaede yang cantik namun santai dan Yoshizumi Yuya yang serius dan keras kepala, dimulai sekarang!
description.ja:
第1巻の内容紹介: 糖度300％の同棲ラブコメ
両親が借金3000万を残して海外逃亡…！？追い詰められた吉住勇也の前に、不意に現れたのは社長令嬢の同級生・一葉楓。勇也も密かに憧れていた日本一可愛い女子高生1位に選ばれた楓は、彼女は意外な提案をするが

Dai 1-kan no naiyō shōkai: Tōdo 300-pāsento no dōsei rabu kome ryōshin ga shakkin 3000 man o nokoshite kaigai tōbō…!? Oitsumerareta Yoshizumi Yūya no mae ni, fui ni arawareta no wa shachō reijō no dōkyūsei 一葉楓. Yūya mo hisoka ni akogarete ita nihon'ichi kawaii mesukōsei 1-i ni eraba reta kaede wa, kanojo wa igaina teian o suruga.

altTitles.ja: 友人の妹
The Friend's Sister

description.en: The long awaited new series from Shima Tokio, an irregular boy meets girl story. Please enjoy this extraordinarily sweet romantic comedy.
